use_cases.name: Successful Signup with Email and Password
use_cases.description: User signs up with a valid email and password
preconditions: User has a valid email address

use_cases.name: Failed Signup with Invalid Email
use_cases.description: User signs up with an invalid email
preconditions: User has an invalid email address
postconditions: Error message is displayed to user

use_cases.name: Failed Signup with Weak Password
use_cases.description: User signs up with a weak password
postconditions: Error message is displayed to user
